column1: - Aspirin, ibuprofen (Motrin, Advil), naproxen (Aleve), other arthritis drugs, vitamin E, warfarin (Coumadin), and any other drugs that make it hard for the child's blood to clot - Vitamins, minerals, herbs, or other supplements - Medicines for heart problems, lung problems, diabetes, allergies, or seizures - Other medicines the child is supposed to take everyday If my child has asthma, diabetes, seizures, heart disease, or any other medical problems, do I need to do any thing special before my child has anesthesia?
- Will my child have any pain?
- Will my child have an upset stomach?
- If my child had spinal or epidural anesthesia, will my child have a headache afterwards?
